metadata.title: CVE-2020-1752 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability introduced in glibc upstream version 2.14was found in the way the tilde expansion was carried out. Directory pathscontaining an initial tilde followed by a valid username were affected bythis issue. A local attacker could exploit this flaw by creating aspecially crafted path that, when processed by the glob function, wouldpotentially lead to arbitrary code execution. This was fixed in version2.32.

criterions.comment: eglibc package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
